Level 6 Transmutation Spell

Shoot a thin green ray from your finger. If the 50∼100 Force damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, it disintegrates into a crumbly ash.

Disintegrate is a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. Disintegrate is a Lvl 6 Spell from the Transmutation school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflict Status Ailments, buff Characters or interact with the environment.

Disintegrate Information

Description: Shoot a thin green ray from your finger. If the 50∼100 Force damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, it disintegrates into a crumbly ash. Level: Lvl 6 spell School: Transmutation School Casting Time: Action Range: 9m Requires Concentration: No Saving Throw: DEX Save

How to Acquire Disintegrate

Disintegrate can be acquired by the following classes: Sorcerer, Wizard Disintegrate can be cast by using the following Items: ???

Sorcerer, Wizard

Disintegrate Tips & Notes

Synergises well with Spells such as 'Bane' or 'Slow', that which can lower a target's Dex Saving Throw score, reducing the target's chance to resist 'Disintegration'. Disintegrate will ALWAYS succeed against Sleeping targets. Regarding this, unlike the 'Sleep' Spell; 'Eyebite' can be used to reliably inflict Sleep against an enemy, regardless of their HP. Making it possible to guarantee a Disintegration within only 2 actions.
